5 Day Split - Push Pull Legs Upper/Lower

Monday - Push SetsxReps Tuesday - Pull SetsxReps Wednesday - Legs SetsxReps Friday - Upper SetsxReps Saturday - Lower SetsxReps
Bench Press 4x5 Barbell Row 4x8-10 Squat 4x5 Bench Press 3x8-10 Squat 4x6-8
Overhead Press 3x6-8 Pull-up 3x8-10 Romanian Deadlift 4x8-10 Incline Bench 3x8-10 Deadlift 3x5
Cable Fly 3x12-15 Lat-Pulldown 3x8-12 Hack Squat 4x8-10 Pull-up 3x8-10 Leg Extension 4x12-15
Close-Grip Bench 3x8-10 Bicep Curl 4x12-15 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15 Cable Row 4x12-15 Hamstring Curl 4x12-15
Lateral Raises 4x12-15 Hammer Curl 4x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 4x12-15 Bicep Curl 4x12-15 Lateral Raises 4x12-15
Calf Raises 3x12-15 Cable Crunches 4x12-15 Calf Raises 3x12-15 Tricep Pushdown 4x12-15 Calf Raises 3x12-15
